HomeHero.descriptionPart1.defaultMessage: The purpose of Verida Missions incentivized testnet is to stress-test network infrastructure, Verida applications and prepare storage node operations for the Verida mainnet.

HomeHero.descriptionPart3.defaultMessage: Are you ready to ignite your journey? The countdown to the Verida mainnet begins now!

activities.claimGateKeperAdopter.shortDe.defaultMessage: Go to the GateKeeper claim page and start the process. You will have the connect with your Verida Wallet and then claim the Credential by scanning the QR code again. Once saved in your Wallet, share this credential by replying to the message you received in your inbox.

app.meta.defaultDescription.defaultMessage: Discover the future of web3 on the Verida Network. Join the incentivized testnet and experience secure decentralized data storage, zero-knowledge credentials, and more.
app.meta.defaultDescription.description: Default application description for the meta tags

app.meta.defaultTitle.defaultMessage: Verida Missions: Explore Decentralized Identity and Private Data Storage
app.meta.defaultTitle.description: Default application title for the meta tags

missions.mission-01.shortDescription.defaultMessage: This first mission guides you through the process of onboarding onto the Verida Network. It's designed to familiarize you with the Network's features, functionalities, and ecosystem, ensuring you have a smooth and seamless experience as a Verida user.

missions.mission-02.shortDescription.defaultMessage: The Verida Wallet supports Polygon ID for the reception, holding of Verifiable Credentials (VC) that can then be presented in a privacy preserving way to third parties, via Zero-Knowledge Proof (ZKP). This mission will guide you through the process of claiming Polygon ID credentials.

missions.mission-02.title.defaultMessage: Leverage Credentials and Zero-Knowledge with Polygon ID

missions.mission-03.shortDescription.defaultMessage: In Mission 3 we need your help to stress-test the network infrastructure. By performing various activities and pushing the limits of the testnet, you will play a crucial role in identifying and resolving any potential bottlenecks or vulnerabilities. Your efforts will ensure that the Verida mainnet operates at its full potential, providing a reliable and efficient decentralized storage solution.

useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyBeingE.defaultMessage: An activity is already being executed, please wait for it to finish
useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyBeingE.description: Notification message when user try to execute an activity while there's already one being executed

useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyExecut.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but the activity is already executed

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionComp.defaultMessage: Congrats, you have completed the activity
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionComp.description: Notification message when user completes an activity

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionPend.defaultMessage: The activity is pending, check the next step in the instructions
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionPend.description: Notification message when after the execution, an activity is in pending state

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionTodo.defaultMessage: Hmm, the activity was not completed properly
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionTodo.description: Notification message when executing an activity reset back to its todo status

useExecuteActivity.activityNotFoundNotif.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but the activity is not found

useExecuteActivity.errorWhileExecutionAc.defaultMessage: Hmm, There was an executing the activity, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.errorWhileExecutionAc.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but there is an error while executing it

useExecuteActivity.errorWhileSavingExecu.defaultMessage: Hmm, There was an issue while saving the activity result, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.errorWhileSavingExecu.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but there is an error while saving the result

useExecuteActivity.nonSupportedExecution.defaultMessage: Hmm, Something went wrong, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.nonSupportedExecution.description: Notification message when the execution activity resulted in an unknown status

useExecuteActivity.termsNotAcceptedNotif.defaultMessage: Please accept the terms and conditions
useExecuteActivity.termsNotAcceptedNotif.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but the terms and conditions are not accepted
